channel.title: Too Beautiful to Live with Luke Burbank - News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM Seattle, WA
channel.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
channel.description: Radio That Will Change Your Life (not necessarily for the better)
channel.itunes:summary: TBTL is an often tedious but occasionally thrilling trip into the mind of host Luke Burbank. Each night Luke, Producer Jen and Sean the Engineer talk about their lives, their loves, and sometimes, light things on fire.

image.title: Too Beautiful to Live with Luke Burbank - News Talk 710 KIRO Seattle, WA

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 6-18-10 12:00 pm-1:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Sean tries (unsuccessfully) to convince Luke and Vanessa that Human Centipede is worth watching, Utah's Attorney General gets the first ever 'Dude, Seriously?!' Award, and listener Judy writes in to agree with Sean that her uncle's old Ballard restaurant is, in fact, a crap-hole.
item.description: Sean tries (unsuccessfully) to convince Luke and Vanessa that Human Centipede is worth watching, Utah's Attorney General gets the first ever 'Dude, Seriously?!' Award, and listener Judy writes in to agree with Sean that her uncle's old Ballard restaurant is, in fact, a crap-hole.

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 6-17-10 12:00 pm-1:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Luke's truly awful talent agent checks in with another pathetic job opportunity, Sean thinks he's got a ghost living in his new apartment, and is Icing the new facebook poke? Listener Eric in Brooklyn says yes.
item.description: Luke's truly awful talent agent checks in with another pathetic job opportunity, Sean thinks he's got a ghost living in his new apartment, and is Icing the new facebook poke? Listener Eric in Brooklyn says yes.

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 6-16-10 12:00 pm-1:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Jen tries to single-handedly save the economy of one small Ohio town.  Luke feels like a battered wife when it comes to his relationship with the Apple store, and TBTL-ella Song of The Summer Search. Round Two.
item.description: Jen tries to single-handedly save the economy of one small Ohio town.  Luke feels like a battered wife when it comes to his relationship with the Apple store, and TBTL-ella Song of The Summer Search. Round Two.

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 6-15-10 12:00 pm-1:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: A California man gets arrested in Pakistan as he tries to hunt down Osama Bin Laden (by himself), and Luke is kind of impressed. Hari Kondabolu stops by to talk about the rigors of standup comedy, progressive politics, and how Luke has no idea how to pronounce his name, and the 15 things Larry King wonders about (courtesy of his twitter feed).
item.description: A California man gets arrested in Pakistan as he tries to hunt down Osama Bin Laden (by himself), and Luke is kind of impressed. Hari Kondabolu stops by to talk about the rigors of standup comedy, progressive politics, and how Luke has no idea how to pronounce his name, and the 15 things Larry King wonders about (courtesy of his twitter feed).

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 6-14-10 12:00 pm-1:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Did Afghanistan just go all Beverly Hillbillies on it? The NYT says yes, Blake Hounshell from Foreign Policy drops by TBTL to say probably not. Plus, Mike Pesca checks in from South Africa with a World Cup Report, and The Tens of Listeners submit some of the worst jokes Luke has ever heard, but he reads them on-air anyway.
item.description: Did Afghanistan just go all Beverly Hillbillies on it? The NYT says yes, Blake Hounshell from Foreign Policy drops by TBTL to say probably not. Plus, Mike Pesca checks in from South Africa with a World Cup Report, and The Tens of Listeners submit some of the worst jokes Luke has ever heard, but he reads them on-air anyway.

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 6-11-10 12:00 pm-1:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Luke freaks out when Sean sees his dirty dishes, the SOD guys stop by to talk 'Worst Movie You Can See' this weekend, and the debut of a new segment: 'America's Got Talent is Basically the Worst Thing Ever... Except For This One Thing That Happened.'
item.description: Luke freaks out when Sean sees his dirty dishes, the SOD guys stop by to talk 'Worst Movie You Can See' this weekend, and the debut of a new segment: 'America's Got Talent is Basically the Worst Thing Ever... Except For This One Thing That Happened.'

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 6-10-10 12:00 pm-1:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Luke's car gets towed leading him to make some major life-changes.  Jen's got a lot of reasons to love the idea of Kevin Costner cleaning up the BP Oil Spill. And Luke's agent makes an unforgettable appearance on TBTL.
item.description: Luke's car gets towed leading him to make some major life-changes.  Jen's got a lot of reasons to love the idea of Kevin Costner cleaning up the BP Oil Spill. And Luke's agent makes an unforgettable appearance on TBTL.

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 6-9-10 12:00 pm-1:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: The grossest call-makers EVER (you might not even want to listen to this one), plus, the nerds get their hands on 'Bros Icing Bros', and Farhad Manjoo of Slate dot com reviews the new iPhone.
item.description: The grossest call-makers EVER (you might not even want to listen to this one), plus, the nerds get their hands on 'Bros Icing Bros', and Farhad Manjoo of Slate dot com reviews the new iPhone.

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 6-8-10 12:00 pm-1:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: The gang kicks off the TBTL-ella ella Song of the Summer Search, plus, Jen needs a new system for remembering fancy words, and Luke finally learns why he is so terrible at baking.
item.description: The gang kicks off the TBTL-ella ella Song of the Summer Search, plus, Jen needs a new system for remembering fancy words, and Luke finally learns why he is so terrible at baking.

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 6-7-10 12:00 pm-1:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: TBTL Live From Space Car! Third Time's A Charm edition
item.description: TBTL Live From Space Car! Third Time's A Charm edition

item.title: BEST OF: Why It Matters: Male nudity (or dude-ity).
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: The release of 'Forgetting Sarah Marshall' causes the TBTL crew to ponder male nudity in film.
item.description: The release of 'Forgetting Sarah Marshall' causes the TBTL crew to ponder male nudity in film.

item.title: BEST OF: Ken Lee...a dibba dubba doubt doo.
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: An audition for Bulgarian Idol leaves everyone at TBTL hilariously humming Mariah Carey
item.description: An audition for Bulgarian Idol leaves everyone at TBTL hilariously humming Mariah Carey

item.title: BEST OF: Why It Matters: The A-Team
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: How Mr. T kept Mike Essl off drugs, and changed his life forever.
item.description: How Mr. T kept Mike Essl off drugs, and changed his life forever.

item.title: BEST OF: On The Bubble with Mike Pesca
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: NPRs Mike Pesca arbitrarily declares thing to be in or out of fashion. Hilarity ensues.
item.description: NPRs Mike Pesca arbitrarily declares thing to be in or out of fashion. Hilarity ensues.

item.title: BEST OF: Broke As A Joke In Seattle.
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Luke's pal Kelly and Engineer Sean trade stories on surviving Seattle when you're broke. Sean talks about the medical experiments he's subjected himself to in order to make ends meet.
item.description: Luke's pal Kelly and Engineer Sean trade stories on surviving Seattle when you're broke. Sean talks about the medical experiments he's subjected himself to in order to make ends meet.
